name: Instant Pot® Charro (Refried Beans)
author: droach3
summary: This recipe is written to be prepared in an Instant Pot® pressure cooker. With some small alterations, I am sure you can cook it on the stovetop as well. These beans are great served as is or blended to be the texture of refried beans.
ingredients: ½ cup roughly chopped cilantro, or to taste
directions: Combine water, pinto beans, onion, salsa, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, garlic, tomato bouillon, vegetable bouillon, chili powder, paprika, cumin, and black pepper in an electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select Bean/Chili function; set timer for 45 minutes
Cooker will reach high pressure in 10 to 15 minutes
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
